50238.<voice 02164_00050238><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02164_00050238><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>Who are you? Why do you look like me?!<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 02636_00050315><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>Thank you for coming, Lord Dyme. I am

50316.<voice 02781_00050316><start_lip_sync n0:

50329.<voice 01384_00050329><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 01384_00050329><start_lip_sync n02070 _normal m00001>Miss Mishua, are you all right?<stop_lip_animation n02070 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 02575_00050337><start_lip_sync n02070 _normal m00001>Human memory is a mysterious thing. Even

29000561.<voice 02870_29000561><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 02870_29000561><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>E-Ehh... Just a little tired... I think<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50347.<voice 00362_00050347><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 00362_00050347><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>I summoned you all here for one reason.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50348.<voice 00392_00050348><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00392_00050348><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>I received word of a Red Dragon that has

50349.<voice 00432_00050349><start_lip_sync n0:

<voice 00472_00050350><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Eh. Me...? I don't know that I would be

50352.<voice 00542_00050352><start_lip_sync n0:

50363.<voice 01112_00050363><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01112_00050363><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>Alright, we're off. The dragon appeared in the

you may realize a cruel fate that has been

50275.<voice 03113_00050275><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03113_00050275><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>I can't guarantee you will be able to live
with that truth. Can you handle that?<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50276.<voice 03198_00050276><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03198_00050276><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>It doesn't matter. No matter how bad the
memories are, they're MY memories!<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50277.<voice 03258_00050277><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03258_00050277><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>I recall someone precious who has been
there for me... For the sake of that person,
I must absolutely remember!<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50278.<voice 03338_00050278><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 03338_00050278><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>I am relieved to hear that.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50279.<voice 03378_00050279><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03378_00050279><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>To retrieve a sealed memory, one must
enter your memories and break the seal.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50280.<voice 03489_00050280><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03489_00050280><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Now, <pc>.
That's where you come in.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50281.<voice 03528_00050281><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03528_00050281><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>When we passed through the Three Way
Gate... I asked you to collect for me three
butterflies. Do you remember?<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50282.<voice 03603_00050282><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 03603_00050282><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>It's time for those butterflies to flap their
wings.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000573.<voice 04381_29000573><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04381_29000573><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Lovely, isn't it? That mystical door will take
you to the world of memories. But...<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000574.<voice 04382_29000574><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04382_29000574><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>My apologies, <pc>, but
no more than a single person can pass
through this door. Who will go?<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000576.<voice 04384_29000576><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04384_29000576><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>There is something about Mishua. Just like
 <pc> I can't see her future.<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000577.<voice 04385_29000577><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04385_29000577><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Hmmm, <pc>, as I suspected, you
have some kind of connection with Mishua,
it seems.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000578.<voice 04386_29000578><start_lip_sync n0: <voice 04386_29000578><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>I think it would be best if you go.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50284.<voice 04427_00050284><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 04427_00050284><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Once you step through, you will find yourself
already deep within Mishua's memories. Now,
approach the pillar of light.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53832.<voice 00175_00053832><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00175_00053832><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Oh, <pc>. Did you come to see
me because you were worried?<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53833.<voice 00215_00053833><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00215_00053833><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>Don't worry, I'm fine. I never thought I'd
stay in a room this nice...<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53834.<voice 00265_00053834><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00265_00053834><start_lip_sync n02070 _normal m00001>This room belongs to the Princess. But she's
always busy defeating monsters and visiting
other lands.<stop_lip_animation n02070 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53835.<voice 00295_00053835><start_lip_sync n0:
When she's here, she just stays holed up in the throne room and even sleeps there... She says it's official business. So she never
uses her room.

53836.<voice 00335_00053836><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00335_00053836><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>She really works so hard... but it's thanks to
her that someone like me can use such a nice
room like this.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53837.<voice 00405_00053837><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00405_00053837><start_lip_sync n02000 _normal m00001>I'm feeling tired, so I think I'm going to
get some rest. I think you should do the same.<stop_lip_animation n02000 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53838.<voice 00445_00053838><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00445_00053838><start_lip_sync n02070 _normal m00001><pc>, you may use the room in the
east tower on the opposite side. It looks
the same as this room does.<stop_lip_animation n02070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
